data.author: cheeseisdisgusting

changelog.release_notes: Fixed timeline pins. It broke last update. Sorry!

It just snowed for the first time in Ottawa a few days ago. Winter is coming. Unlike bears, that hibernate, this app now has gained the capability to wake up just in time for winter.

That means that in settings, there's now an option to make the app wake up every day at 12AM, to automatically fetch the date and push timeline pins. It automatically closes itself 15 seconds too! :) So instead of having to open the app every morning to have timeline pins, it will automatically do that!

NOTE: This feature is disabled by default. Because of how Pebble.js apps work, this may fail if the watch isn't connected to your phone. In these cases, it will show the "Your watch is disconnected" message, and will not quit itself. If you see this message frequently, best to disable this option. :(

Happy Canadian Thanksgiving (even though it was three days ago)!

This release adds timeline support for classes. As long as the app is opened at least once a day, pins will be pushed to your timeline. This means that classes can now be seen on top of the watchface (if you have a Time series or higher), or with one push of the down button!

The icon for Earth and Space Sciences has been changed to a rocket. Those are more interesting than stars.

The app has also been updated to work for the 2016-2017 school year. School is starting soon for Colonel By, and I had to make sure that my app would work.

Thanks for downloading, and if you think this app is nice, give it a heart on the app store. It would make my day!
Fixed the icon for Earth and Space Sciences.

Fixed an issue where when offline, would display the fourth period instead of the first.
Also fixes an issue if the first launch is offline and it's summer - it no longer displays an error!
Fixed the icon for physics, so it no longer displays a monitor.
View what day it is at Colonel By and what classes you have right on your wrist. See your schedule, course code, teacher, and room with two clicks of a button. Never forget what class you have again!

data.description:
NEVER FORGET WHAT CLASS IT IS! (At least if you go to Colonel By.)

With CB Schedule, you'll be able to: 

- See the current day and what your next class is with a few clicks of a button!

- See your entire schedule, course codes, teacher, and room number with just another! (Plus, icons for almost every class!)

- Add your friends' schedules so they don't get lost either!

- See your schedule on the Timeline, so you don't even need to open the app!

- A cow picture, if you figure out how to see the credits.

Requires setup with Pebble app. Unfortunately, the app is not magical and cannot guess your schedule. :(

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed timeline pins. It broke last update. Sorry!

data.title: CB Schedule
